name: Evaluation of Large Language Models
brief_introduction: This study investigates cultural biases in Large Language Models (LLMs) and their impact on cross-cultural representation.
introduction: This study investigates cultural biases in Large Language Models (LLMs) and their impact on cross-cultural representation. Focusing on autonomous vehicle ethics and health decision-making, it examines LLMs' handling of culturally-sensitive scenarios. The research aims to develop strategies for enhancing cultural diversity in LLMs, improving fairness, and informing global governance frameworks.
